image¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

plasma_service.urls module¶

plasma_service.views module¶

plasma_service.views.delete_donate_request(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle the delete functionality for plasma donor for a specific user. It finds that particular entry of that user and delete that entry.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns the home page for plasma service.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.delete_donate_request_form(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the available plasma donor list for a specific user and it displays a form for where user can input a id from the list to delete that particular plasma donor.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns login page when user is not logged in, else it returns the page that display form to delete and donor list for that specific user.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.delete_request(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle the delete functionality for plasma request for a specific user. It finds that particular entry of that user and delete that entry.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns the home page for plasma service.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.delete_request_form(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the available plasma request list for a specific user and it displays a form for that user where user can input a id from the list to delete that particular request for plasma.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns login page when user is not logged in, else it returns the page that display form to delete and that users requests.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.donate_plasma(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle plasma donation registration form, it takes data from the form and stores it in the database that is for plasma donor.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns a thank you page when data

is successfully stored in data base, else it will return the donor registration form again.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.donate_plasma_form(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display plasma donate request form only when the user is logged in, else it will display the login page for user to log in.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns login page when user

is not logged in, else it returns the registration form for plasma donation.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.plasma_home(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display home page for this plasma service function.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a home page for plasma service which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.request_plasma(request)[source]¶

This method is used to handle plasma request form, it takes data from the form and stores it in the database that is for plasma request.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns a thank you page when data

is successfully stored in data base, else it will return the plasma request form again.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.request_plasma_form(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display plasma request form only when the user is logged in, else it will display the login page for user to log in.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page. It returns login page when user

is not logged in, else it returns the plasma request form.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.search_donate_request(request)[source]¶

This method is used to search plasma donors by blood group, it search all the records in the data base for a specific blood group and display the results.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the available entry

of the plasma donors in the data base that matches the users entry.

Return type

HttpResponse.

plasma_service.views.search_request(request)[source]¶

This method is used to search plasma request by blood group, it search all the records in the data base for a specific blood group and display the results.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the available entry

of the plasma request in the data base that matches the users entry.

plasma_service.views.show_plasma_donate_request(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the available plasma donor list. :param request: it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a html page that display all the available entry

for the plasma donor.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Returns

of the plasma request in the data base.
